TextEng: "I seek the Five-Fold Mysteries of the Sleeping Man..."
Text: "나는 잠자는 자의 오중 수수께끼를 찾고 있어..."

TextEng: "You know the Second-Fold Mystery. Show me."
"So this is a guessing game, is it?"
"Remind me what these stones look like."
"What stone am I leading you to again?"
Text: "내가 너를 어떤 돌로 데려가야 하는 거였지?"

TextEng: "Finally. Now get lost, dog meat, I've got work to do."
Text: "드디어. 이제 꺼져, 개새끼야, 나 할 일이 있어."

TextEng: "There we go. Do you feel better now?"
"So she's freezing to death. What's the big deal?"
"Which stone do you want me to take you to?"
"So this is a guessing game, is it?"
"I seek the Five-Fold Mysteries of the Sleeping Man..."
Text: "나는 잠자는 자의 오중 수수께끼를 찾고 있어..."

TextEng: "You know the Second-Fold Mystery. Show me."
"So this is a guessing game, is it?"
